item.title: My IPBan doesnt work. Error posted. whats wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("ipban")) { String tehnub = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player lel = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(tehnub)]; if (lel != null) { lel.appendIPBan(); SocketListener.loadBannedHosts(); lel.disconnected[0] = true; BufferedWriter bw = null; } }

Method you need:

public void appendIPBan() { BufferedWriter bw = null; try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./data/banned/bannedhosts.dat", true)); bw.write(Server.socketListener.getAddress(this.socket.socket)); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { } finally { if (bw != null) { try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { } } } }

Read full topic

item.title: My IPBan doesnt work. Error posted. whats wrong?
item.dc:creator: @adecker adecker
item.description:
@adecker wrote:

IPBan doesnt work? what wrong?

else if (cmd[0].equals("ipban")){ String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2.rights < 1) { if (p2 != null) { Engine.fileManager.appendData("./Mezzy-Scape 508 Source V3.5/bin/data/banned" + Server.socketListener.getAddress(p2.socket.socket) + ".dat", "IpBanned"); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You have just IpBanned " + p2.username); } } else if (p2.rights >= 1) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "You cannot ipban staff!"); } }

when i do it i get

java.lang.NullPointerException at Bulby.io.packets.Commands.handlePacket(Commands.java:2305) at Bulby.io.PacketManager.parsePacket(PacketManager.java:400) at Bulby.io.Packets.parseIncomingPackets(Packets.java:94) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:181) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

anyone know whats wrong?

Read full topic
